metadata.name: Feeling of Relief
metadata.description:
I recently came across the Charity NGO in Iran, "Yarane Hamishegi" which helps less fortunate students and kids by providing books, notebooks, and stationery sets, building a library for them, and a lot of other help for their education and well-being,  
 
this NGO has been active for more than 10 years and they Helped a lot of kids in the Past few years in Sistan & Baluchistan region in Iran

now they are funding an educational package for children, each package contains 4 pencils, 4 pens, an eraser, a pencil sharpener, 5 notebooks, a coloring pencils pack, and a small bag for only 3 Dollars!! 

this Edition piece is a token of appreciation in a form of an open Edition, 100% of the earning will go to this NGO and I will send the further report about their performance to all the collectors.

and this is the Instagram link for this NGO: 
www.instagram.com/yarane_hamishegi
